content: Set up React + Vite project in /Users/davidg/code/taskasaurus_app/frontend/
Create API client utility to connect to FastAPI backend at localhost:8000
Build child join family form (User Story 2)
Build chore creation form for parents (User Story 3)
Build family dashboard showing chores and points
Implement child view to mark chores complete (User Story 4)
Implement parent approval system for completed chores (User Story 5)
Make all components mobile-responsive with Tailwind
Add localStorage for persisting family code and user role
Test complete user workflow from family creation to chore approval
Create frontend README with setup instructions
